00029 btVector3 PhysVector3::GetBulletVector3()
00030 {
00031     btVector3 Theirs;
00032     Theirs.setX(this->X);
00033     Theirs.setY(this->Y);
00034     Theirs.setZ(this->Z);
00035     Theirs.setW(0);
00036     return Theirs;
00037 }

00039 Ogre::Vector3 PhysVector3::GetOgreVector3()
00040 {
00041     Ogre::Vector3 Theirs;
00042     Theirs.x=this->X;
00043     Theirs.y=this->Y;
00044     Theirs.z=this->Z;
00045     return Theirs;
00046 }
